titleStmt.title: A floorish vpon fancie As gallant a glose vpon so triflinge a text, as euer was written. Compiled by N.B. Gent. To which are annexed, manie pretie pamphlets, for pleasant heads to passe away idle time withal. By the same authour.
titleStmt.author: Breton, Nicholas, 1545?-1626?

notesStmt.note: "The toyes of an idle heade" has separate divisional title page; register is continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
